name: NBCNews
text: California Latinas in 2019 were paid on average 42 cents for every dollar a white man earned, report finds. https://t.co/93fS1CTYZk

name: NBCNews
text: A dying Indigenous woman filmed a Facebook Live video of hospital staff in Quebec, Canada, taunting her, an incident that has sparked protests, prompting an investigation and a nurse's firing. https://t.co/J9pNLlKX9B

name: NBCNews
text: BREAKING: Close Trump aide Hope Hicks has tested positive for coronavirus, according to a source close to the Trump campaign. https://t.co/kdrUxk2XiK https://t.co/XHj977W3Dc

name: NBCNews
text: Hicks, who recently traveled on Air Force One with the president to Cleveland for Tuesday’s debate, is among the highest-profile members of the admin. to test positive and is in frequent contact with President Trump. https://t.co/ao3N7pWVSG

name: NBCNews
text: Amazon says nearly 20,000 U.S. employees have contracted Covid-19 https://t.co/zf76EoPWgf

name: NBCNews
text: President Trump said he would overturn decisions by U.S. Navy SEALS and Navy Special Warfare Combatant-craft Crewmen to make their ethos and creed statements gender-neutral. https://t.co/fTuRRAehmM

name: NBCNews
text: The rate of mail-in ballot rejections in North Carolina is nearly 4 times higher for Black voters than white voters. State election officials stress that the ballot review process doesn’t contain information about race, but some voters are wary. https://t.co/6K8ZmxVKsO
